name: Cat Jump (itch)
description:
Cat Jump You have to jump

Game is made for the Bolt Jam.

Instructions

- Space to jump
- R  to restart from start
- Escape to reload scene
- Q to quit game

Used assets/libraries

Here is a list of used Unity assets/ libraries in the project:

  • Bolt
    • Bolt.Addons.Community
  • ProCamera2D
  • TextMesh Pro
  • DOTween

Music was created with the Figure -app on iOS.
